## bubbles.TextInputBubble.setSize() method

Sets the size of this bubble, including the border.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setSize(size: Size, relayout?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  size | [Size](./blockly.utils_namespace.size_class.md) | Sets the size of this bubble, including the border. |
|  relayout | boolean | _(Optional)_ If true, reposition the bubble from scratch so that it is optimally visible. If false, reposition it so it maintains the same position relative to the anchor. |

**Returns:**

void
